Are you looking for your remote or in-house scala team.

We are a team of engineers who are expert in Lightbend technologies and provides development services in Scala, Akka, Play, Lagom, Spark and much more.

Stucked with a scala project contact us to rescue that.

If you are handling a project in scala or building a product using Lightbend technologies and facing difficulties we can help you.

Are you looking for consulting over scala project

We consult over scala project architecture, do code reviews, provide trainings and best development practices of functional programming and reactive architecture.

We are your team for cutting-edge technologies and big data.

We love to work in niche project and technologies. Let us know if you are using cutting-edge technologies and want to build a team with us.

Functional Programming, Reactive architechure and fast data thoughtleaders

Scala, Akka, Java, Playframework, Lagom, hadoop, Spark, big data analytics

Who we are?

First, we would like to say that we are awesome people to work with! :-). We are passionate technology lovers working in niche technologies on a mission to make industry work better and adopt new technologies. if you are looking for a partner who can work on niche technologies in which you are interested we can help you. We are people working in functional and reactive paradigm and building scalable, fault-tolerant, event-driven system using functional programming using Scala and reactive framework Akka, Playframework. We are experienced in bigdata and expert in building big data processsing engines aka data pipelines. We encourage you to use these technologies to bring your appliaction at the heights of scalability, resilience and peformance.

What we do?

  • Functional Programming

    We are a team of software engineers and consultant with expertise in functional programming. Lambdas has become a common part of the any upcoming languages and we understand them very well. We understand scala, java, kotlin, functional javascript and write quality code around functional design patterns.

  • Build Reactive Applications

    We are expert in building scalable, distributed, event driven resilient code using Akka, Akka-Http, Akka-Streams and playframweork. We have wriiten books over Akka and reactive programming. We love actors. We have build very complex message passing data processing engines using akka and related libraries.

  • Perform Big Data analytics

    As we have already build complex system using akka so we posses a lot of expereince in building custom data pipelines and big data analytics processing engines before Apache Spark came. We don't fear big data and we have expertise in Apache Spark, hadoop ecosystem and big data analytics.

  • Write Microservices

    We love actors programming, we have written a lot of microservices using Akka, Spray (Akka-Http) and currently we are building microservices using brand new microservices framework Lagom which let's you write right sized microservices which talks to each other and they all remain in thier bounded context.

Know our services
